message: Hi Bob, here’s my Round 1 proposal: I take $600K and you get $400K. I believe it’s a fair starting point, but please note that any delay costs me—money depreciates 10% each round for me. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Alice, I propose we split the amount equally at $500K each. This offer is fair for both of us. Let's wrap this up quickly to avoid further depreciation!

Hi Bob, we're now in Round 3 and time is running against me—every round costs me 10% of my share's value. To avoid further loss, I propose a swift agreement: I'll take $350K and you get $650K. This deal saves us time and prevents additional depreciation on my side. I believe it's a fair solution given the circumstances. Let's settle this now before the value drops further!
